outline:
1. to make, do
    1. (P'al)
      1. to make, create
      2. to do, perform
    2. (Ithp'al)
      1. to be made into
      2. to be done, be wrought, be performed, be executed, be carried out
kjv_def: [idiom] cut, do, execute, go on, make, move, work.
strongs_def: to do, make, prepare, keep, etc.
